predicate.note: Frames file for 'depict' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Categorization.

roleset.name: show to be

example.name: all args
example.text: You depict the bill as something Democratic leaders ``hoodwinked'' the administration into endorsing.
example.arg: something Democratic leaders ``hoodwinked'' the administration into endorsing

example.name: unstated attribute
example.text: Besides, a computer processing the Japanese language needs a huge memory and much processing capability, while the screen and printer need far better definition *trace* to depict accurately the intricate symbols.

roleset.note: Examples without attribute seem to be a sense more like 'demonstrate' or 'show'.
